title: Quickie: Surviving Wedding Season
description:
Summer is here, which means one thing: It's Wedding Season. Resident guest Kmarko stops by to talk Feits through the do's and don'ts of surviving his first ever wedding season.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kfcr
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
